actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to establish a commission to study the monetary role of gold.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to establish a Commission to study U.S. policy concerning the role of gold in domestic and international monetary systems. Requires such Commission to report its findings and recommendations to Congress.

titles.title: A bill to establish a commission to study the monetary role of gold.
